You can also find out how we use cookies in our <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/cookies" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a>.</p>

You can also find out how we use cookies in our <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/cookies" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a>.</p>

    <section id="form-section">
        <div class="container jumbotron">
                <form action="https://cloud.email.shellenergy.co.uk/preference-centre" method="post" name="ShellEnergy">
               <input type = "hidden" name = "submittedForm" value = "true">
                   <input type = "hidden" name = "BillingAccountId" value = "[BillingAccountId]">
              
                <!-- Question 1 -->
                <div class="form-row">
                    <div class="col-md-12">
                        <p>You are currently subscribed to the following marketing communications from Shell Energy:</p>
             
                    </div>
                </div>
                  
             
                <div  id="errorComm" class="form-error my-1 mb-3 p-1 py-3">
                    <p class="text-left">Please select subscription preferences.</p>
                </div>
             
                      
                <!-- Checkbox 1 -->
                <fieldset class="mb-3">
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input1_check1" name="news" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Competitions and news
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input1_check2" name="offers" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Information about Shell products, services and offers
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input1_check3" name="charity" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Charity initiatives
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input1_check4" name="thirdparty" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Information about products, services and offers from trusted partners*
                        </label>
                    </div>
                   
                </fieldset>

                <!-- Notes 1 -->
                <div class="form-row">
                    <div class="col-md-12 mb-3">
                        <p class="dim">*We want you to know we never sell your data to third parties for marketing purposes. We work with selected partners who provide useful products and services ranging from home solutions to seasonal offers and charity initiatives.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <hr class="diveder-shell-form">

                <!-- Question 2 -->
                <div class="form-row">
                    <div class="col-md-12 mt-4">
                        <p>You currently receive your marketing information by:</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
             
              <div id="errorChannel" class="form-error my-1 mb-3 p-1 py-3">
                    <p class="text-left">Please select your preferred contact method.                </p>
              </div>
            
                <!-- Checkbox 2 -->
                <fieldset class="mb-3">
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input2_check1" name="email" value="true" <span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Email
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input2_check2" name="phone" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Telephone
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <div class="checkbox">
                        <label>
                            <input type="checkbox" id="input2_check3" name="SMS" value="true" ><span class="checkbox-material"><span class="check"></span></span> Text
                        </label>
                    </div>
                    <span id="Checkbox_error2" class="errore" style="visibility: hidden;">ERROR</span>
                </fieldset>

                <!-- Notes 2 -->
                <div class="form-row">
                    <div class="col-md-12 mb-3">
                        <p class="dim">If you choose to opt out of all marketing communications that's fine, but we will still need to contact you about your account occasionally (for billing, payments, account updates, etc.)</p>
                    </div>
                </div>

                <fieldset>
                  
                    <button type="submit" name = "saveButton" value = "true" class="btn btn-custom btn-hero btn-primary btn--wide read-limit mb-4">Save preferences</button>
                </fieldset>

                <div class="form-row">
                    <div class="col-md-12 mt-3">
                        <p class="dim">Data privacy - take a look at our <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/privacy" target="_blank">Privacy Policy</a> and <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/terms/energy/domestic" target="_blank">Terms and Conditions</a> to find out how we store, use and keep your personal information safe. You can also find out how we use cookies in our <a href="https://www.shellenergy.co.uk/info/policies/cookies" target="_blank">Cookie Policy</a>.</p>
                    </div>
                </div>
            </form>
